00055 typedef enum
00056 {
00057   APS_EVENT_RESET_ID = 0x19,
00058   APS_EVENT_START_ID = 0x8a,
00059   APS_EVENT_STOP_ID  = 0xc5
00060 } APS_EventId_t;
00061 
00063 typedef struct
00064 {
00065   void *next;       
00066   APS_EventId_t id; 
00067 } APS_Event_t;
00068

00073 } APS_ResetConf_t;
00074

00090 } APS_ResetReq_t;

00221 {
